name: Egg Condition
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION

A platformer game about a chicken inside a place

This is my first full game, I created it without a game engine and it doesn't have a graphical interface. All inside the terminal (cmd)

SERVER DISCORD FOR QUESTIONS: https://discord.gg/gY8cVVgTy9

||| TUTORIAL |||

HOW TO INSTALL?

1. Un-zip the folder

2. Open "egg_condition.exe"

HOW TO PLAY?

1. Play

2. Solve the first puzzle to escape from the first area

3. You are the tutorial, you know everything you should know

Always check for updates :)
